data.name: Yuhha: Stolen Treasure WALLPAPER PACK
data.detailed_description:
Humble pack of Full HD (16:9) wallpapers.
If the DLC is downloaded, screenshots will be in the local game folder.
data.about_the_game:
Humble pack of Full HD (16:9) wallpapers.
If the DLC is downloaded, screenshots will be in the local game folder.
data.short_description: Humble pack of Full HD wallpapers (16:9).
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron N2840
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics (Bay Trail)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron N2910 or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics (Bay Trail) or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
